at.fht.robotFactory

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fht.robotFactory.Factory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Factory
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The main class of or controller the robotfactory, which represents also the Watchdog for all threads
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Christoph Hackenberger

        private static void setupLog4J()
        basic setup for Log4J this method is a little bit tricky because it sets a system property to the logfile dir but Log4j has at this time already created a file ${sys:kfhuCTPdas} as defined in the xml so we have to delete this
